title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops Harpers Ferry National Historical Park is committed to promoting the use of cultural and natural resources in the classroom. To help teachers incorporate these resources the park assists in hosting teacher institutes. All Teacher Workshops     Suggested Reading We offer a education materials packet for download. Additionally, we have started compiling a list of links to books and documents for teachers and others who may want to conduct research or for those who just want to learn more about Harpers Ferry history. All Suggested Reading
